nodes.bodyText: Just remove the throws if no extra javadoc.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -82,8 +82,7 @@
    * @param nonceKey A unique identifier for this operation from the client or process.
    * @param latch A latch to block on for precondition validation
    * @return procedure id
-   * @throws IOException Throws {@link ClusterSchemaException} and {@link InterruptedIOException}
-   *    as well as {@link IOException}
+   * @throws IOException

nodes.bodyText: I think removal of @throws might cause javadoc warnings, providing some description here would be better. Based on impl, it seems we might not be able to get rid of throws from method signature.

nodes.bodyText: OK, i will add some description about the exception, thanks
